scene_description_enriched: An angel with red wings and a pink robe descends from a blue sky dotted with gold clouds, holding a scroll that reads 'Ave Maria'. Below, a man wearing a straw hat and a white tunic is harvesting a field of golden wheat with a scythe. His legs are bent as he works amongst the stalks, and he holds a tool in his right hand. The scene is set outdoors in a cultivated field.
